Message:
This morning, the girl—
who was supposed to
have drunk poisoned tea—
appeared to be perfectly fine.

That didn’t work either, huh?
This is getting strange...

Could it be that
this girl is a witch too?

If so, that would
explain everything.
Including the reason why
she was left alone here.

Having a witch in the family—
even just the suspicion of it—
is enough to cause a scandal.

Especially in noble society,
where reputation is everything.
Which means, that girl...

She was in the manor’s garden,
burying her little pet bird
that suddenly died this morning.

“It was twittering so cheerfully
just yesterday,” she said,
attempting to muster up a smile.

I must admit,
I felt a twinge of pity for her
in that moment.

...Don’t let her get to you.
As per the organization’s
final warning,
I need to finish this job
by the next full moon.

Well, if I can’t
make it look like an accident,
there’s only one option left.
